information.title: Account information
information.header: Enter a name for your device and choose a user icon and colours

login.title: Login to your account
login.description: Oh, you're asking for the key to my top-secret lair, also known as The Fortress of Wordsmithery, accessed only by reciting the sacred incantation of the 12-word passphrase!

verify.title: Enter your passphrase
verify.description: If you've already lost it, how will you ever be able to take care of a child?

notFound.title: Couldn't find that page
notFound.message: We looked everywhere: under the bins, in the closet, behind the proxy but ultimately couldn't find the page you are looking for.

errors.errorAborted: The fetching of the associated resource was aborted by the user's request.
errors.errorNetwork: Some kind of network error occurred which prevented the media from being successfully fetched, despite having previously been available.
errors.errorDecode: Despite having previously been determined to be usable, an error occurred while trying to decode the media resource, resulting in an error.
errors.errorNotSupported: The associated resource or media provider object has been found to be unsuitable.

notFound.title: Couldn't find that media.
notFound.text: We couldn't find the media you requested. Either it's been removed or you tampered with the URL.

episodes.emptyState: There are no episodes in this season, check back later!

noStream.title: No stream
noStream.text: This source has no streams for this movie or show.

noEmbeds.title: No embeds found
noEmbeds.text: We were unable to find any embeds for this source, please try another.

failed.title: Failed to scrape
failed.text: We were unable to find any videos for this source. Don't come bitchin' to us about it, just try another source.

downloads.title: Download
downloads.disclaimer: Downloads are taken directly from the provider. movie-web does not have control over how the downloads are provided.
downloads.hlsExplanation: Insert explanation for why you can't download HLS here

onPc.1: On PC, right click the video and select <bold>Save video as</bold>
onPc.title: Downloading on PC

onAndroid.1: To download on Android, <bold>tap and hold</bold> on the video, then select <bold>save</bold>.
onAndroid.title: Downloading on Android

onIos.1: To download on iOS, click <bold><ios_share /></bold>, then <bold>Save to Files <ios_files /></bold>. All that's left to do now is to pick a nice and cozy folder for your video!
onIos.title: Downloading on iOS

quality.title: Quality
quality.hint: You can try <0>switching source</0> to get different quality options.
quality.iosNoQuality: Due to Apple-defined limitations, quality selection is not available on iOS for this source. You can try <0>switching to another source</0> to get different quality options.

search.failed: Failed to find media, try again!
search.placeholder: What do you want to watch?

loadingUserError.textWithReset: Failed to load your profile from your custom server, want to reset back to default?

migration.inProgress: Please hold, we are migrating your data. This shouldn't take long.

dmca.title: DMCA
dmca.text: In an effort to address the copyright concerns associated with the website known as "movie-web," the DMCA, or Digital Millennium Copyright Act, has been initiated to safeguard the intellectual property rights of content creators by reporting infringements on this platform, thereby adhering to legal protocols for takedown requests, which, like, you know, it's all about, like, maintaining the integrity of intellectual property, and, um, making sure, like, creators get their fair share, but then, it's, like, this intricate dance of digital legalities, where you have to, uh, like, navigate this labyrinth of code and bytes and, uh, send, you know, these, like, electronic documents that, um, point out the, uh, alleged infringement, and it's, like, this whole, like, teeter-totter of legality, where you're, like, balancing, um, the rights of the, you know, creators and the, um, operation of this, like, online, uh, entity, and, like, the DMCA, it's, like, this, um, powerful tool, but, uh, it's also, like, this, um, complex puzzle, where, you know, you're, like, seeking justice in the digital wilderness, and, uh, striving for harmony amidst the chaos of the internet, and, um, yeah, that's, like, the whole, like, DMCA-ing thing with movie-web, you know?

register.title: Sync to the cloud
register.text: Instantly share your watch progress between devices and keep them synced.

delete.title: Delete account
delete.text: This action is irreversible. All data will be deleted and nothing can be recovered.
delete.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your data will be lost!

locale.title: Locale
locale.languageDescription: Language applied to the entire application.

captions.title: Captions
captions.previewQuote: I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer.

workers.label: Use custom proxy workers
workers.description: To make the application function, all traffic is routed through proxies. Enable this if you want to bring your own workers.
workers.emptyState: No workers yet, add one below

server.label: Custom server
server.description: To make the application function, all traffic is routed through proxies. Enable this if you want to bring your own workers.

footer.tagline: Watch your favorite shows and movies with this open source streaming app.

legal.disclaimerText: movie-web does not host any files, it merely links to 3rd party services. Legal issues should be taken up with the file hosts and providers. movie-web is not responsible for any media files shown by the video providers.
